record.col: select id,code,name from pub_comboboxdict where type='发现渠道' order by seq
getTreeTempletRef("PUB_CORP_DEPT_CODE1","id","name","","可以多选=N;只能选叶子=N;只留前几层=0;返回路径链名=N");
getTreeTempletRef("PUB_CORP_DEPT_CODE1","id","name","","可以多选=Y;只能选叶子=N;只留前几层=0;返回路径链名=N");
select id, code, name from pub_comboboxdict where type = '生产系统列表' order by seq
getTreeTempletRef("BSD_BSACT_CODE1","id","name","","可以多选=N;只能选叶子=N;只留前几层=0;返回路径链名=N");
getCommUC("树型模板参照", "模板编码","OR_EVENT_TYPE_CODE1", "ID字段","id", "NAME字段","name", "只留前几层","0", "展开","N", "可以多选","N", "只能选叶子","N", "返回路径链名","N", "是否截掉第一层","Y", "是否显示按钮面板","N" );
getCommUC("引用子表", "模板编码","CMP_WARDEVENT_CUST_CODE2", "主键字段名","id", "关联外键字段名","cmp_wardevent_id", "拦截器","com.pushworld.ipushgrc.ui.icheck.p050.CheckEventCustOrUserTableUIIntercept", "取值","" );
getCommUC("引用子表", "模板编码","CMP_WARDEVENT_USER_CODE2", "主键字段名","id", "关联外键字段名","cmp_wardevent_id", "拦截器","com.pushworld.ipushgrc.ui.icheck.p050.CheckEventCustOrUserTableUIIntercept", "取值","" );

getListTempletRef("CMP_RISK_CODE1","id","riskname"," cmpfile_id = " + getItemValue("cmp_cmpfile_id") ,"可以多选=Y;自动查询=N;查询面板隐藏=N;"); //5个参数,第1个是模板名,第2个是参数id的取值项,第3个是参照name的取值项,第4个是参照自定义过滤条件(与模板的过滤条件做and叠加),第5个是参数设置项
select id,code,name from pub_comboboxdict where type='合规事件_损失状态' order by seq
getTableRef("select id id$,id id$,code 损失,name 描述 from pub_comboboxdict where type='风险损失_合规因素' order by seq")
setRefItemName("serious",getSQLValue("字符串","select code from pub_comboboxdict where type='风险损失_合规因素' and id='"+getItemValue("serious")+"'","null"))
getTableRef("select id id$,id id$,code 损失,name 描述 from pub_comboboxdict where type='风险损失_财务损失' order by seq")
setRefItemName("finalost",getSQLValue("字符串","select code from pub_comboboxdict where type='风险损失_财务损失' and id='"+getItemValue("finalost")+"'","null"))
getTableRef("select id id$,id id$,code 损失,name 描述 from pub_comboboxdict where type='风险损失_声誉影响' order by seq")
setRefItemName("honorlost_type",getSQLValue("字符串","select code from pub_comboboxdict where type='风险损失_声誉影响' and id='"+getItemValue("honorlost_type")+"'","null"))
select id,code,name from pub_comboboxdict where type='合规事件_监管处罚' order by seq
select id,code,name from pub_comboboxdict where type='合规事件_法律制裁' order by seq
select id,code,name from pub_comboboxdict where type='合规事件_原因分析分类' order by seq
select id,code,name from pub_comboboxdict where type='整改建议分类' order by seq
select id,code,name from pub_comboboxdict where type='整改结果分类' order by seq
